alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 10:49AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of Trace to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and north central, northeast and northwest Missouri. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
